pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.4.eng: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.5.eng: The training rule on what is scented

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.2.eng: the nuns from the group of six were bathing with scents and oilseed flour.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.4.eng: “How can nuns bathe with scents and oilseed flour? They’re just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.5.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.5.eng: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.6.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.6.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.7.pli: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.7.eng: “How can the nuns from the group of six bathe with scents and oilseed flour?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.8.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.8.eng: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.11.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.11.eng: “How can the nuns from the group of six do this?

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.13.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.13.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.14.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.14.1.eng: ‘If a nun bathes with scents and oilseed flour, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.8.eng: ground sesame is what is meant.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.10.pli: nahāyati. Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.10.eng: is bathing. For the effort there is an act of wrong conduct. At the end of the bath, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.2.eng: if she does it because she is sick;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.3.eng: if she bathes with ordinary oilseed flour;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.5.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.6.eng: The sixth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:0.5.eng: The second training rule on disposing of feces

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhunupassayaṃ nissāya yavakhettaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.2.eng: At that time a brahmin had a barley field next to the nuns’ dwelling place.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.3.pli: Bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi khette chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.3.eng: The nuns disposed of feces, urine, trash, and food scraps in that field.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.4.pli: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.4.eng: The brahmin complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.5.eng: “How could the nuns spoil my barley field?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.5.comm: “Spoil” renders dūsessanti. For a discussion of this word, see Appendix of Technical Terms.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.6.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.6.eng: The nuns heard the complaints of that brahmin,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.7.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.7.eng: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.8.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.8.eng: “How could nuns dispose of feces, urine, trash, and food scraps on cultivated plants?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.9.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.9.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.12.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.14.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.14.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.15.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.15.1.eng: ‘If a nun disposes of feces or urine or trash or food scraps on cultivated plants, or she has it disposed of in this way, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.12.pli: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.12.eng: food remnants or bones or used water.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.14.pli: pubbaṇṇaṃ aparaṇṇaṃ yaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.14.eng: grain, vegetables, whatever cultivated plants people consider valuable or useful.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.16.eng: if she disposes of it herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.18.eng: in asking another, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.19.pli: Sakiṃ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.19.eng: If she only asks once, then even if the other disposes of such things many times, she commits one offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.1.pli: Harite haritasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.1.eng: If they are cultivated plants, and she perceives them as such, and she disposes of it or has it disposed of, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.2.pli: Harite vematikā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.2.eng: If they are cultivated plants, but she is unsure of it, and she disposes of it or has it disposed of, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.3.pli: Harite aharitasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.3.eng: If they are cultivated plants, but she perceives them as uncultivated, and she disposes of it or has it disposed of, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.4.eng: If they are uncultivated plants, but she perceives them as cultivated, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.5.eng: If they are uncultivated plants, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.6.eng: If they are uncultivated plants, and she perceives them as such, there is no offense.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.3.2.eng: if she disposes of it after having looked;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.3.3.eng: if she disposes of it at the edge of the field;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.3.4.eng: if she disposes of it after asking and getting permission from the owners;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.3.6.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.3.7.eng: The ninth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.4.eng: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.5.eng: The training rule on having a nun massage

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.2.eng: the nuns were having a nun massage and rub them.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.3.pli: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.3.eng: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.4.eng: “How can nuns get a nun to massage and rub them? They’re just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.5.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.5.eng: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.6.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.6.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.7.eng: “How can nuns get a nun to massage and rub them?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.8.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.8.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.11.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.13.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.13.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.14.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.14.1.eng: ‘If a nun has a nun massage her or rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.7.eng: If she has a nun massage her:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.8.eng: if she gets her to massage her, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.9.eng: Or if she has a nun rub her:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.10.eng: if she gets her to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.5.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.6.eng: The seventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.4.eng: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.5.eng: The training rules on having a trainee nun … a novice nun … a female householder massage

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.2.eng: the nuns were having a trainee nun …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.1.eng: … a female householder massage and rub them.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.2.pli: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.2.eng: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.3.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.3.eng: “How can the nuns get a female householder to massage and rub them? They’re just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.4.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.4.eng: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.5.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe…  tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.5.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.6.eng: “How can nuns get a female householder to massage and rub them?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.7.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.7.eng: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.10.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.12.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.12.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.13.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī (sikkhamānāya …pe…  sāmaṇeriyā …pe… ) gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.13.1.eng: ‘If a nun has (a trainee nun … a novice nun …) a female householder massage her or rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.6.eng: a female who is training for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.6.comm: It seems the past participle sikkhita here needs to be read as a present participle.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.8.eng: a female training in the ten training rules.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.10.eng: a female who lives in a house is what is meant.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.11.eng: If she has her massage her:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.12.eng: if she gets her to massage her, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.13.eng: If she has her rub her:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.14.eng: if she gets her to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.2.5.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.2.6.eng: The tenth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:0.4.eng: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:0.5.eng: The training rule on not asking permission

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.2.eng: nuns sat down on seats in front of a monk without asking permission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.3.eng: The monks complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.4.eng: “How can nuns sit down on seats in front of a monk without asking permission?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.5.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.5.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.8.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.10.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.10.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.11.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.11.1.eng: ‘If a nun sits down on a seat in front of a monk without asking permission, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.1.6.eng: in front of one who is fully ordained.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.1.10.eng: even if she sits down on the ground, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.1.pli: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.1.eng: If she has not asked permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she sits down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.2.pli: Anāpucchite vematikā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.2.eng: If she has not asked permission, but she is unsure of it, and she sits down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.3.pli: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.3.eng: If she has not asked permission, but she perceives that she has, and she sits down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.4.eng: If she has asked permission, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.5.eng: If she has asked permission, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.6.eng: If she has asked permission, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.2.eng: if she sits down on the seat after asking permission;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.6.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.7.eng: The eleventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:0.4.eng: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:0.5.eng: The training rule on asking questions

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.2.eng: the nuns asked questions of a monk who had not given them permission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.3.eng: The monks complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.4.eng: “How can nuns ask questions of a monk who hasn’t given them permission?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.5.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.5.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.8.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchissanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.10.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.10.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.11.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.11.1.eng: ‘If a nun asks a question of a monk who has not given her permission, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.5.eng: Who has not given her permission:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.10.pli: suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.10.eng: if she gets permission to ask about the discourses, but she asks about the Monastic Law or philosophy, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.11.pli: Vinaye okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.11.eng: If she gets permission to ask about the Monastic Law, but she asks about the discourses or philosophy, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.12.pli: Abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.12.eng: If she gets permission to ask about philosophy, but she asks about the discourses or the Monastic Law, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.1.pli: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.1.eng: If she has not asked permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she asks a question, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.2.pli: Anāpucchite vematikā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.2.eng: If she has not asked permission, but she is unsure of it, and she asks a question, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.3.pli: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.3.eng: If she has not asked permission, but she perceives that she has, and she asks a question, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.4.eng: If she has asked permission, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.5.eng: If she has asked permission, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.6.eng: If she has asked permission, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.3.2.eng: if she asks after getting permission;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.3.3.pli: anodissa okāsaṃ kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.3.3.eng: if she gets permission, but not in regard to a specific subject, and she then asks about any subject;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.3.5.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.3.6.eng: The twelfth training rule is finished.
